content: unruly klee this shawl is inspired by paul klee s intriguing painting head of a man which captures the essence of abstraction and whimsy through its bold lines and playful the unruly klee s shawl is an asymmetrical triangular shawl that features a series of geometric shapes and flowing lines reminiscent of the contours seen in klee s work the shawl is worked in a boomerang shape it combines varying stitch patterns to create texture and depth emulating the layered elements of klee s painting to capture the vibrant spirit of klee s color choices this shawl utilizes a palette of warm and rich ochre tones embrace the spirit of artistic expression as you knit this whimsical shawl bringing the canvas to life through your own hands 1 www unrulystitch com- instagram @unrulystitch
